There is a positive necessity for the steward of God to pray much that he may not be deceived in anywise in handling the Lord's goods. He is a 


                                    -259- 

steward, a partner in the firm, and if he moves not by impulse but from a sense of conviction that he must invest his Lord's goods to advance the glory of God in the work of saving souls to Jesus Christ, then [he] himself will be benefited eternally, if he holds fast his confidence and faith and trust in God firmly unto the end.
